intro: Ditassa monocoronata, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the family Gesneriaceae and is characterized by its compact, upright growth habit. The plant produces showy, tubular flowers in a variety of colors, including purple, pink, and white.
